name: SATURN 3D
description:
If you love the game Asteroids, you'll love SATURN 3D by Virtual GS!

Your spaceship is flying in the middle of a shower of asteroids. Blast the asteroids with lasers! Beware: big asteroids will fragment into smaller asteroids! How long can you survive?

This is the best 3D game for your Apple Watch!

GAME DESCRIPTION
• Use Digital Crown to move spaceship.
• Blast the asteroids with lasers!
